skyhanni.name: SkyHanni
skyhanni.note: Use the version page above and swap in the Modrinth CDN link if you want auto-download.

skytills.name: Skytils
skytills.note: Replace with a direct asset link (GitHub release asset) if you want auto-download.

dulkirmod.name: DulkirMod
dulkirmod.note: Latest is 1.2.9; replace with the direct .jar asset URL if you want auto-download.

watersolver.name: WaterSolver
watersolver.note: Stand-alone water board solver. Swap in the specific .jar asset link if desired.

ctjs.name: ChatTriggers (ct.js)
ctjs.note: Install from the official site; provide direct .jar if you want the launcher to fetch it.

patcher.name: Patcher
patcher.note: Official Sk1er/Essential page. Patcher is great with 1.8.9; add direct CDN link if available.

optifine.name: OptiFine
optifine.note: OptiFine uses an ad-gated dynamic URL; you generally can’t script a stable direct link.

skyblockextras.name: SkyBlock Extras (SBE)
skyblockextras.note: Paid/licensed. Do not auto-download or redistribute. Add your personal download URL after purchase.

odin.name: Odin
odin.note: General SkyBlock QoL. Replace with a specific release asset link for auto-download.

cofmod.name: cofmod
cofmod.note: I couldn’t confidently identify this. If you meant a specific mod (e.g., COFL-related), share its repo/link.
